content: d e l i l ah van e s s a s m i t h skill level easy peasy copyright © 2020 this pattern or any portion thereof may to make a 23cm x 23cm square not be repeat roduced or used in any manner whatsoever without the express written permission of the designer the pattern uses us terminology with for questions relating to permission or usage ema il metric sizes hosteam@hookedonsunshine co before you begin crocheting always read through the pattern first to give you a better understanding of what you will colours are for reference only and will need to do vary based on lighting monitor settings it is important to always keep track of and devices stitch counts while working the pattern kits and videos available here 1 m at eri als ➢ any yarn of your choice i used colourspun dk cotton ➢ 4mm hook or hook compatible with yarn used ➢ needle for sewing in ends yarn colours an d qu anti ti es ➢ if you have purchased a yarn kit you will need to match my gauge or you may run short of yarn ➢ if you are using your own yarn it is not imperative that you match my gauge but it is important to keep your gauge even throughout your project for best results ➢ you will need approximately 50 grams to complete the square ➢ your square should measure 23cm when complete ➢ a 3-round solid double_crochet square = 7cm 2 yar n colours an d placem en t colourway 1 round 1 golden yellow round 2 marmalade round 3 salmon round 4 hibiscus round 5 grape round 6 moss green round 7 artichoke round 8 mediterranean round 9 lavender round 10 turquoise round 11 denim round 12 denim round 13 denim round 14 turquoise round 15 grape round 16 moss green round 17 artichoke round 18 golden yellow round 19 marmalade round 20 hibiscus round 21 salmon 3 yar n colours an d placem en t colourway 2 round 1 natural round 2 lemonade round 3 dusty pink round 4 grape round 5 stone blue round 6 ocean round 7 mermaid s treasure round 8 mermaid s treasure round 9 sea spray round 10 nimbus cloud round 11 dusty pink round 12 dusty pink round 13 grape round 14 sea spray round 15 mermaid s treasure round 16 mermaid s treasure round 17 stone blue round 18 ocean round 19 mermaid s treasure round 20 sea spray round 21 ocean 4 stu ffs to know this pattern uses us terminology you will note that my starting chain for a double_crochet and half_double_crochet is 2 i e ch2 this is just a personal preference you are welcome to start with ch3 for a double_crochet and ch2 for a half_double_crochet or even start with a standing stitch do what is comfortable for you stitch counts for the corner are given separately to stitches per side chain spaces will be given
